flawed_nl_solution:
After buying 3 pieces of gum Ariana has 10 + 3 = <<10+3=14>>14 pieces of gum.
After giving her 11 friends gum Ariana has 14 - 11 = <<14-11=3>>3 pieces of gum left.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 14. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
